page.title: 13GARAGES
page.content:
Middleton garage sells old and new cars There is a workshop with 3 mechanics & spare parts are sold.They do not sell petrol or sweets,nor do they have a car wash.About 325 cars a year are sold,the best selling model in 1985 being the Montego.It is a British Leyland franchise,with hire service.It cost them 300 pounds to be linked by 'phone to the B.L. computer for car ordering.
The family owned garage at Wilbarston opened in 1940 as a tin shed.In 1970 a cafe was built with 3 petrol pumps.The by-pass built in 1974 resulted in a slump in trade,and the cafe with one pump was closed.Today the garage has two employees,and opens for five and a half days a week.
